Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary decision to assign a specific User Story to a specific Sprint Backlog.

Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary decision to assign a specific Worker to a specific Team.

Name: assign_task_to_worker
Description: Binary decision to assign a specific Task to a specific Worker.

Name: set_feature_priority
Description: Set the priority level for a Feature

Name: include_feature_in_release
Description: Binary decision to include a specific Feature in a specific Release Plan.

Name: set_user_story_points
Description: Set the estimated effort for a User Story using story points from the Fibonacci sequence.

Name: set_task_status
Description: Update the status of a Task as it moves across the Scrum Board.

Name: define_sprint_start_date
Description: Set the start date for an upcoming Sprint.

Name: define_sprint_end_date
Description: Set the end date for an upcoming Sprint.

Name: allocate_project_budget
Description: Set the total budget for a Project.

Name: set_team_size
Description: Determine the number of members in a Team.

Name: set_blocker_severity
Description: Assess and set the severity of a newly identified Blocker.

Name: assign_role_to_worker
Description: Binary decision to assign a role (e.g. Scrum Master) to a worker.
